tool_description: An API showing all the latest Aviation News around the world
name: Aviation News Live
title: Aviation News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Sources News
api_list.description: Gets Latest Aviation News from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aviation-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/generalAviationNews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aviation-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aviation-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aviation-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Aviation Latest News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Aviation from all over the world !
